subtitle: The perfect quick and easy weekday meal.

ingredients.ingredient: long grain rice and wild rice

method.text: Place the rice in a pan of boiling water. Bring back to the boil. Simmer until tender, according to pack instructions. Drain well. Set aside.
Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the onion, bacon, sausage, pepperoni, beans and tomatoes. Fry for 3-5 min until onion is softened and sausage is cooked.
Stir the rice into the frying pan with the parsley and seasoning. Heat through for 5 min or until piping hot.

title: Smoked sausage and bacon risotto
